Free Code Camp

Spoke for the official Norfolk Free Code Camp Facebook group!

Wednesday - May 25, 2016

1 minute read ∙ 99 words

0 Comments

Free Code Camp Norfolk

May 25th, 2016

So You Want To Be A Wizard

757 Makerspace

Norfolk, Virginia

Invited to speak for FreeCodeCamp Norfolk’s group on how to get started as a developer.

So You Want To Be A Wizard | Free Code Camp Norfolk

We had a fantastic turn out last night at the Meetup and it was great to meet so many new faces. Next month we'll have more of a quick lightning talk, and will be coding as a group through a couple of algorithms. It will be a great learning experience.
